General.Name: Orca Energy Group Inc
General.Description: Orca Energy Group Inc. engages in the exploration, development, production, and sale of oil and gas to the power and industrial sectors in Tanzania. It principally holds interests in the Songo Songo block located to the south of Dar Es Salaam. The company was formerly known as Orca Exploration Group Inc. and changed its name to Orca Energy Group Inc. in July 2020. Orca Energy Group Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Road Town, British Virgin Islands.
General.Address: Vistra Corporate Service Centre, Road Town, British Virgin Islands, VG110
